name: Wizard PONG
description:
The classic ping pong experience mixed with magic and lite RPG elements. Defeat your enemies and reuse their spell gems to your advantage.

Wizard PONG is a submission to the Genre Mash Jam.

*IF THE BALL GETS STUCK BETWEEN INFINITE BOUNCES PRESS P*

@ricenoodles: code, art.
@adoankim: sound FX, music
Spritefont: opengameart

Software used:

-Construct 3, Clip Studio Paint, Ableton Live
